message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this great product. I'm thinking $90 would be a fair price, what do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $90 is a bit too high for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $70. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $80?
Bob, I appreciate your interest!  $70 is a little low for me, but I'm willing to come down a bit. How about $85?
I'm still interested in the product, but $85 is a bit too high for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $75. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $80?
